about_the_game:
Explore the kingdom and restore it to its former glory

After years of The Guardians' betrayal on the kingdom, after years of self exile... You decide it's time to fulfill your destiny and become The Chosen One

The Wanderer: Chosen One it's a 2.5D sidescroller action adventure that combines 3D environments and handmade pixel art for characters and enemies. Explore different levels, unlock hidden magic, control the power of the elements and overcome every challenge that's put on your way.

Game Features

  • Tight 2D controllers that let you perform complex and precise movement. Teleport, cast spells, hit and run your way across the kingdom.
  • Explore different levels and find hidden abilities and relics to enhance your power and capabilities.
  • Over 20 enemies and 10 epic bosses and mini-bosses, fight your way against The Guardians forces and prove your skill and power.
  • Obtain new elemental powers every time you defeat a boss. Control the power of the elements and destroy your foes.
  • Complete the game and unlock Battle Arena Mode. Prove yourself worthy and combat The Guardian forces in the arena.

short_description: The Wanderer: Chosen One is a fantasy action platformer where you have to clear levels by using your abilities and defeating bosses. Explore different kingdoms, battle against the fallen guardians, and earn their elemental powers.
